message.content:
Figma is a cloud-based design tool for creating and prototyping user interfaces. It allows teams to collaborate on designs in real-time, making it an ideal tool for remote work or distributed teams. With Figma, users can create high-fidelity mockups of their designs using a variety of pre-made components and custom styles, as well as preview how they would look on different devices directly from within the app.

Figma also includes features such as version control, which allows team members to view and compare previous versions of design files, and accessibility checks that help ensure designs meet accessibility standards. It supports a wide range of file formats, including PNG, JPEG, SVG, and BMP for images, as well as HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript for interactive elements.

Figma is free to use with limited features, but also offers paid plans with more advanced tools and capabilities, such as increased collaboration space, design system management, and team organization.
